## Importing from Google Sheets

```{r, echo=FALSE}
# install.packages("googlesheets4")
# install.packages("summarytools")

# load key libraries
library(magrittr)
library(googlesheets4)
library(summarytools)

# import data from Google Sheet (make sure default browser has Google account logged in)
funeraldat <-
  googlesheets4::read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1AlG0GhTicxUbCPHj1ACeafNoXQ3mLu4AvDpUezS-X0k/edit?gid=0#gid=0",
                            range="A2:O28")

# redefine binary variables as character factors; drop uninformative variables
funeraldat %<>% mutate(Inadvertent = factor(ifelse(Inadverdant==0,"No","Yes"))) %>%
  select(-`Large police funeral?`)

```

## Exploratory figures

```{r, echo=FALSE}

summarytools::descr(funeraldat)

```
